title: Disable Scrolling and zooming in WebView
body: Using the webview control is sometimes a big pain. Please create properties for disable Scrolling, Pan and Zoom and Auto ressizing the webview.

comments.body: If I precisely size a WebView in XAML, then it's showing me a scrollbar still even though the height is precise.  My internal HTML content handles the scroll, but I'm still getting a XAML based scrollbar I can't disable and then in turn lets the user scroll past the 'end of the page' and see a white bar (page background as web content background is different color).
